original_text: The sailors were very frightened. Each of them called out to his own god for help. They threw into the sea all the things that the ship carried. They wanted to make the ship as light as they could. Jonah had gone down into the bottom of the ship. He was lying down and he was asleep.
korean_text: 사공들이 두려워하여 각각 자기의 신을 부르고 또 배를 가볍게 하려고 그 가운데 물건들을 바다에 던지니라 그러나 요나는 배 밑층에 내려가서 누워 깊이 잠이 든지라

sentences.original_text: Each of them called out to his own god for help
They threw into the sea all the things that the ship carried
sentences.korean_translation: 배가 실은 모든 것들을 바다에 던졌습니다

sentences.original_text: They wanted to make the ship as light as they could
sentences.korean_translation: 배를 가능한 한 가볍게 만들고 싶었습니다

sentences.original_text: Jonah had gone down into the bottom of the ship
He was lying down and he was asleep
